title: E308 Medium Debbie
itunes:title: Medium Debbie
description:
Theo talks about the differences between campers and the homeless, gives advice on how to make a good "Best Man" speech, meeting with the promiscuous Medium Debbie in the window and how to apply "Ask her out" to all facets of your life.
